questions.question_text: How does a data quality assessment impact business outcomes for companies using AI?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Data quality is extremely important for future outcomes from AI based system.

choices.C: Improves the speed of AI recommendations
choices.B: Accelerates the delivery of new AI solutions
choices.A: Provides a benchmark for AI predictions
Violating a data privacy law and failing to pay fines
choices.C: Launching an AI feature after discovering a harmful bias
choices.B: Delaying an AI product launch to retrain an AI data model

questions.question_text: What is an example of ethical debt?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
https://www.salesforceairesearch.com/static/ethics/EthicalAIMaturityModel.pdf “Ethical debt is accrued when you launch features that violate your ethical AI principles because, for example, you didn’t do a bias assessment, or you didn’t mitigate the bias that was found”

Selected Answer: C
An AI feature launched even after discovering a harmful bias.

Selected Answer: C
C. Launching an AI feature after discovering a harmful bias

comments.content: Scratch that it's B per the SF Ethical AI Practice Maturity Model :)

discussion.content:
The answer is Accountable: We believe in holding ourselves accountable to our customers, partners,
and society. We will seek independent feedback for continuous improvement of our
practice and policies and work to mitigate harm to customers and consumers.

Selected Answer: B
B. Keywords: Consequence, diverse
https://www.salesforce.com/eu/blog/meet-salesforces-trusted-ai-principles/

questions.question_text:
A consultant conducts a series of Consequence Scanning Workshops to support testing diverse datasets.
Which Salesforce Trusted AI Principle is being practiced?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C for consistency. They all should use the same method to capture the data.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks wants to develop a solution to predict customers’ product interests based on historical data. The company found that employees from one region use a text field to capture the product category, while employees from all other locations use a picklist.
Which dimension of data quality is affected in this scenario?

A marketing manager wants to use AI to better engage their customers.
Which functionality provides the best solution?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Einstein Engagement
The correct answer is C.Einstein Engagement

Selected Answer: C
C. Keyword: engagement.
